sentences.sentence: You can find great bods everywhere along the beach.
sentences.translation: 你可以沿海滩到处发现身材矫健的人。

sentences.sentence: All of the OAGIS BODs use the same general structure.
sentences.translation: 所有oagis BOD都使用了这一相同的通用结构。

sentences.sentence: The recommendation is to be selective in what BODs you use within your solution.
sentences.translation: 推荐选择在您的解决方案中使用什么 BOD。
